entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect date format in Windows 10 and Windows 11 #60845
  • Why do I have to deploy the "runtimes" folder on a box with dotnet runtime installed? #60844
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationTokenRegistration.OnUnregisteredWithoutInvoke(Action) #60843
  • Broken Link to .NET Forums #60837
  • ETW event Method/LoadVerbose contains wrong method signature for methods receiving function pointer (C#9) #60829
  • JIT ARM32: Assertion failed 'size == EA_4BYTE' during 'Generate code' #60827
  • Infrastructure - Rollout (November 2021) #60826
    7.0.0
  • [Linux][arm] System.Memory.Tests failed with SIGSEGV on rolling build #60825
  • Native dependencies in Blazor WebAssembly - Issue when try use a callback from C++ #60824
  • Test failure System.Drawing.Tests.IconTests.Save_OutputStream_Success(fileName: \"96x96_one_entry_8bit.ico\") #60823
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/hfa/main/testE/hfa_nd2E_d/hfa_nd2E_d.sh #60821
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M13-RTM/b98958/b98958/b98958.sh #60820
  • Test failure Color.RedirectedOutputDoesNotUseAnsiSequences #60819
  • [API Proposal]: QuicConnection.CancelPendingAcceptStream #60818

Closed

  • Intercept the function calls at runtime #60243
    7.0.0
  • CMake and `Send-VSDevShellTelemetry` both failing during build #60838
  • [API Proposal]: Add *Try*ResolveLinkTarget to FileSystemInfo #56256
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: [JsonExtensionData] on a property of type JsonObject generates invalid JSON when serializing #60806
  • NotSupportedException at at System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC.HashFinal() #59289
    Future
  • Enhancement for "Seal internal/private types" #60830
  • Support for EnumMemberAttribute in JsonConverterEnum #31081
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() #60531
    7.0.0
  • Add new ObjectDisposedException constructor overload #51700
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Setting nullable properties and removing null forgiving operator from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop flagging methods with well-known unsupported types for conversion #60841
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • DateTimeMaskTest depends on the region configuration of the machine #60840
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Add a micro optimization to fill_runtime_generic_context (). #60839
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Disable DllImportGenerator tests on s390x #60833
    area-System.Net
  • Change code generation strategy for ILEmitResolverBuilder #60831
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Make memory mapped stress log work for child processes. #60828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Refactor Regex FindFirstChar #60822
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use SDK's .NETFramework refpack version #60555
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip more failing DllImport tests #60836
  • Initial support for partially jitted methods #60791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the antigen summarize bug #60834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't trim PNSE assemblies and enable trimming for inbox assets on all .NETCoreApp versions #58345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Print "callsites by likely classes" chart in 'dotnet-pgo dump' command #59306
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() apis #60672
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Reorganize the creation of the initlocals bblock. #60804
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Clean-up crossgen's NuGet dependencies et. al. #59914
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Up retry for ETXTBSY #60741
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero #60714
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Array functions used by MD arrays as intrinsics #60816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Properly use result value for dump IPC cmd #60726
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [System.Private.CoreLib] Additional trimming for EventSource.IsSupported feature switch #56564
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] encapsulate emscripten js runtime #60504
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • EnvironmentVariables config add missing prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ #57546
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • ci test #59222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows on release/6.0 #60789
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-System.Drawing
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Add pull request template for 5.0 to point to the servicing docs #60414
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [metadata] Break up mono_metadata_parse_type_internal #60725
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use preferred region from PAL for JIT reloc hints #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change Brotli Optimal CompressionLevel value #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • IFormatProvider getter refactor #60815
    community-contribution
